event.title: was merged with the city of Montreal on January 1, 2002

data.event: It consists of the former city of Verdun, which was merged with the city of Montreal on January 1, 2002.
Verdun did not hold a demerger referendum on June 20, 2004.
The settlement of Verdun was founded in 1671, making it one of Canada's oldest cities.

event.title: 1956, Nuns' Island (île des Sœurs) was amalgamated

data.event: In 1956, Nuns' Island (île des Sœurs) was amalgamated with Verdun, which is on the Island of Montreal.
